query.statement:
SELECT A.TM_CD, A.TM_NM, V.UPJANG, A.UPJANGNM, V.CLOSE_DATE, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('001', '007') THEN NVL(MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '001', 'N', '')), 'Y') ELSE '' END) A, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('006', '007') THEN NVL(MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '002', 'N', '')), 'Y') ELSE '' END) B, -- (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('003', '007') THEN NVL(MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '003', 'N', '')), 'Y') ELSE '' END) C, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('004', '007') THEN NVL(MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '004', 'N', '')), 'Y') ELSE '' END) D, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('005', '007') THEN NVL(MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '005', 'N', '')), 'Y') ELSE '' END) E, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('008', '007') THEN NVL(MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '008', 'N', '')), 'Y') ELSE '' END) F, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('009', '007') THEN NVL(MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '009', 'N', '')), 'Y') ELSE '' END) G FROM ( SELECT C.UPJANG, MM||DD CLOSE_DATE, D.CODE CLOSE_GUBUN FROM (SELECT #CLOSE_DATE# MM FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) B, (SELECT TM_NM, TM_CD, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CLOSE_DATE FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE FICS_YN = 'N' AND FS_UPJANG = 'Y' ) C, (SELECT CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'MA0035' AND CODE = DECODE(#CLOSE_GUBUN#, '007', CODE, #CLOSE_GUBUN#)) D WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD AND D.CODE NOT IN (001,002,003,006)
MINUS (SELECT UPJANG, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_GUBUN FROM MAS_CLOSE_MGMT WHERE (CLOSE_DATE BETWEEN #CLOSE_DATE#||'01' AND #CLOSE_DATE#||'31') AND CLOSE_GUBUN NOT IN (001,002,003,006)
)
) V,
SCO_UPJANG_MST_V A WHERE (V.UPJANG = A.UPJANG) AND (A.CLOSE_DATE IS NULL)
AND (A.TM_CD = #TM_CD#)
AND (A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#)
GROUP BY A.TM_NM, A.TM_CD, V.UPJANG, A.UPJANGNM, V.CLOSE_DATE ORDER BY CLOSE_DATE
